title: Eid Announcement
message:
Eid-ul-fitr will be on either Sunday 30th March, or Monday 31st March

Eid prayer will take place at Preston Park BN1 6SD, weather permitting.

title: Al Medinah Mosque
message:
1st Eid prayer - 8:30 AM

2nd Eid prayer - 9:30 AM

3rd Eid prayer - 10:30 AM

title: Al Quds Mosque
message:
1st Eid prayer - 8:00 AM

2nd Eid prayer - 9:00 AM
